mention.text: Russian news portal LifeNews said two of its journalists
abducted near the Ukrainian city of Kramatorsk
the Organization for Security and Cooperation
Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
Journalists Oleg Sidyakin and Marat Saichenko last established contact with the editorial board in Moscow on Sunday at 1:50 p.m. Moscow time -LRB- 09:50 GMT -RRB- as they
